SELECT admission.admission_nm, exam.type_nm, exam.exam_nm, exam_hall_date.hall_date AS exam_date, hall.head_nm, hall.bldg_nm, hall.hall_nm, examinee.dept_nm, examinee.major_nm FROM exam_map INNER JOIN exam ON exam.exam_cd = exam_map.exam_cd INNER JOIN hall ON hall.hall_cd = exam_map.hall_cd INNER JOIN exam_hall_date ON exam_hall_date.exam_cd = exam.exam_cd AND exam_hall_date.hall_cd = hall.hall_cd INNER JOIN admission ON admission.admission_cd = exam.admission_cd INNER JOIN examinee ON examinee.examinee_cd = exam_map.examinee_cd
AND admission.admission_nm = #{param.admissionNm} AND exam.exam_nm = #{param.examNm} AND exam_hall_date.hall_date = #{param.examDate} AND hall.head_nm = #{param.headNm} AND hall.bldg_nm = #{param.bldgNm} AND hall.hall_nm = #{param.hallNm} AND examinee.dept_nm = #{param.deptNm} AND examinee.major_nm = #{param.majorNm} AND exam.admission_cd IN (${param.userAdmissions})
GROUP BY admission.admission_nm , exam.exam_nm , exam_hall_date.hall_date , hall.head_nm, hall.bldg_nm, hall.hall_nm , examinee.dept_nm, examinee.major_nm

SELECT admission.admission_cd, admission.admission_nm, exam.type_nm, exam_hall_date.hall_date AS exam_date FROM exam_map INNER JOIN exam ON exam.exam_cd = exam_map.exam_cd INNER JOIN hall ON hall.hall_cd = exam_map.hall_cd INNER JOIN exam_hall_date ON exam_hall_date.exam_cd = exam.exam_cd AND exam_hall_date.hall_cd = hall.hall_cd INNER JOIN admission ON admission.admission_cd = exam.admission_cd
AND admission.admission_cd = #{param.admissionCd} AND exam.type_nm = #{param.typeNm} AND exam_hall_date.exam_date = #{param.examDate} AND exam.admission_cd IN (${param.userAdmissions})
GROUP BY admission.admission_cd

SELECT exam.exam_cd , exam.adjust , exam.barcode_type , exam.exam_nm , exam.examinee_len , exam.is_absence , exam.is_closed_view , exam.is_horizontal , exam.is_mgr_auto , exam.is_move , exam.item_cnt , exam.keypad_type , exam.period , exam.print_content1 , exam.print_content2 , exam.print_sign , exam.print_title1 , exam.print_title2 , exam.scorer_cnt , exam.tot_score , exam.type_nm , exam.virt_no_digits , exam.virt_no_type , exam.fk_exam_cd , exam.admission_cd
, admission.admission_nm
, exam_hall_date.hall_date , exam_hall_date.virt_no_end , exam_hall_date.virt_no_start , exam_hall_date.hall_cd
, hall.head_nm , hall.bldg_nm , hall.hall_nm FROM exam INNER JOIN admission ON admission.admission_cd = exam.admission_cd INNER JOIN exam_hall_date ON exam_hall_date.exam_cd = exam.exam_cd INNER JOIN hall ON hall.hall_cd = exam_hall_date.hall_cd
AND admission.admission_nm = #{param.admissionNm} AND exam.exam_cd = #{param.examCd} AND exam.exam_nm = #{param.examNm}
